thread.title: Tim Nicholls
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Tim Nicholls

author: Tim Nicholls
title: Tim Nicholls
text:
After receiving my Barbour jacket and finding a large was too tight under the arms , exchange was simple, quick and didn't cost me a penny.
I also liked the fact that my exchange was being dealt with by a human being.
I would recommend this company.
